snippet.title: Last Spartan: Glory Over Madness ( Cinematic Intro Reveal Trailer )
snippet.description:
Steam Page ( Wishlist & Follow for updates )  - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2488270/Last_Spartan_Glory_Over_Madness/

Last Spartan is an epic, ambitious, single-player strategy game with rogue-like deck-building gameplay built around custom dice-building mechanics! Choose your god allegiance and build your dice set to dive into intense turn-based battles.

Build and customize your dice as you battle and explore a dark, randomly generated world, full of new enemies and random encounters on every playthrough.

Last Spartan: Glory Over Madness is an indie game developed by BAD Spiele Studio https://badspiele.studio/ use our email on the website for contact purposes.

© Copyright 2023 BAD Spiele Studio UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
